title: What are the developer options?
answer:
To view the developer options, touch Settings > About phone and touch the build number seven times in rapid succession. 

 1. USB debugging: Enable USB debug mode that allows the operator to use the adb command to debug the phone. 

 1. Stay awake: The screen will never turn off when your phone is charging. 

 1. Allow mock locations: Allow the phone to use mock locations. 

 1. Desktop backup password: Set the backup password. 

 1. Pointer location: Display information about the currently touched item. 

 1. Show touches: Show visual feedback for touches. 

 1. Show CPU usage: Show current CPU usage. 

 1. Force GPU rendering: Use 2D hardware acceleration in applications. 

 1. Animation scale: Control the animation scale. 

 1. Background process limit: Limit the number of background processes. 

 1. [Show all ANRs: Show the "App Not Responding" dialog box for background applications.]()
